sentences.sContent: If the warranty is limited, the terms may entitle you to a replacement or refund.
sentences.sCn: 如果保修单有限制，这些条款可让你有权换货或退款。

remMethod.val: en(使…) + title(题目， 标题) →使有标题 → 命名

words.tran: 给…权利；给…定书名；授…以荣誉（entitle的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to give someone the official right to do or have something
